content: @Anton would it be feasible to do a release for roc-lang/basic-webserver? I'm hoping we can use the same CI servers as basic-cli. Is there anything I can do to assist with this?

I should be able to do a release in a couple of days, after we've made a rog nightly that uses Folkert's simple-c-abi branch. It looks like I can copy the basic-cli release workflow with simple changes.

Is there anything I can do to assist with this?

It would be good to have some tests, preferebly runnable with roc test, I see that for the basic-webserver platform CI is just doing roc check and build.
